statements: SELECT * FROM top_grossing_films;
SELECT film_title, director FROM top_grossing_films;
SELECT film_title, year_released FROM top_grossing_films WHERE box_office_revenue > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM top_grossing_films WHERE year_released < 2000;
SELECT film_title, box_office_revenue FROM top_grossing_films ORDER BY box_office_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM top_grossing_films WHERE year_released > 2010 ORDER BY box_office_revenue DESC, film_title ASC
SELECT film_title, director FROM top_grossing_films WHERE box_office_revenue > 1000000
SELECT director, COUNT(*) AS total_films FROM top_grossing_films GROUP BY director HAVING total_films > 2 ORDER By total_films DESC
SELECT DISTINCT year_released FROM top_grossing_films WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan'
SELECT film_title, box_office_revenue FROM top_grossing_films WHERE year_released BETWEEN 2005 AND 2010 ORDER BY year_released ASC
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT film_title, box_office_gross FROM films ORDER BY box_office_gross DESC;
SELECT film_title FROM films WHERE box_office_gross > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM film_ratings WHERE viewer_rating > 4.5;
SELECT film_title, viewer_rating, critics_rating FROM films JOIN film_ratings ON films.film_id = film_ratings.film_id;
SELECT film_title, box_office_gross FROM films
SELECT * FROM films WHERE box_office_gross > 1000000
SELECT film_title, viewer_rating, critics_rating FROM films JOIN film_ratings ON films.film_id = film_ratings.film_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_films FROM films
SELECT film_title, viewer_rating, box_office_gross FROM films ORDER BY viewer_rating DESC, box_office_gross ASC
SELECT * FROM top_films;
SELECT title, year FROM top_films WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT studio_name, address FROM film_studios ORDER BY studio_name DESC;
SELECT id, review FROM film_reviews WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, gross_amount FROM top_films WHERE gross_amount > 1000000;
SELECT title, year FROM top_films WHERE year < 2000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT studio_name, address FROM film_studios WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT title, gross_amount FROM top_films WHERE gross_amount > 1000000 ORDER BY gross_amount DESC;
SELECT title, review FROM top_films JOIN film_reviews ON top_films.id = film_reviews.film_id WHERE review LIKE '%amazing%';
SELECT studio_name, COUNT(id) AS film_count FROM film_studios JOIN top_films ON film_studios.id = top_films.id GROUP BY studio_name ORDER BY film_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, release_date FROM films WHERE box_office_amount > 1000000;
SELECT title, box_office_amount FROM films ORDER BY box_office_amount DESC;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM actors WHERE age < 30;
SELECT film_id, rank FROM rankings WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC, box_office_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, release_date FROM films WHERE box_office_amount > 1000000 ORDER BY release_date LIMIT 5
SELECT title, rank FROM films JOIN rankings ON films.film_id = rankings.film_id WHERE rank > 8 ORDER BY rank DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT film_id, title, COUNT(actor_id) AS actor_count FROM films LEFT JOIN film_actors ON films.film_id = film_actors.film_id GROUP BY films.film_id ORDER BY actor_count DESC
SELECT film_id, name AS actor_name, nationality FROM film_actors JOIN actors ON film_actors.actor_id = actors.actor_id WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY nationality, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM films
SELECT title, year FROM films WHERE year = 2020
SELECT title, gross_income FROM films ORDER BY gross_income DESC
SELECT name FROM genres
SELECT film_id, genre_id FROM film_genres
SELECT title, year, gross_income FROM films WHERE year > 2000 ORDER BY gross_income DESC
SELECT title, year FROM films JOIN ratings ON films.film_id = ratings.film_id WHERE ratings.rating > 8 ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT name, COUNT(name) AS genre_count FROM genres JOIN film_genres ON genres.genre_id = film_genres.genre_id GROUP BY name
SELECT title, rating FROM films JOIN ratings ON films.film_id = ratings.film_id WHERE rating < 5 OR rating > 8 ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT year, SUM(gross_income) AS total_income FROM films GROUP BY year HAVING SUM(gross_income) > 1000000 ORDER BY year
